title: Designing Social Engagement-Oriented Leadership Education Based on Ecological Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic ecological concepts and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Designing ecological literacy education for corporate managers/leaders that can be practically implemented in daily work environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three practical strategies (e.g., reducing carbon footprint, local ecosystem conservation projects) to enhance ecological literacy within their workplace within 12 weeks.
Learners can independently design community-linked ecological problem-solving workshops on a monthly basis.
Learners can propose at least one sustainability-related policy within their organization within six months after ecological literacy training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
